# jans_service_status (Data Source)

Data source for retrieving Janssen service status.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `service` (String) Service name to check status. Use 'all' to get status of all services.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `status` (Map of String) Map of service names to their status (Running, Down, Not present).
